metadata.dc:title: Postmodernity for Florence Nightingale
metadata.dc:creator: Florentina Zapico Yáñez, Florentina
metadata.dc:description: The author analyzes the influence of the environmental paradigm presented by Hippocrates, the maieutics of Socrates, the role of religious orders in the overall nursing conception Florence Nightingale had by which the observation of social phenomena, both at an individual level as well as a systematic level, comprise the basis of her works(AU)
metadata.dc:title: Postmodernidad en Florence Nightingale. A 100 años de su muerte
